entry.desc: SLIM namelist use_case scenario. Determines the use-case scenario that will be used in the SLIM buildnml utility. This is normally set by the component set.

SLIM run type. 'cold' is a cold start from arbitrary initial conditions, it will fail if you do provide initial conditions 'any' is a run using initial conditions if provided, OR arbitrary initial conditions if no files can be found 'required' is a run where starting from provided initial conditions is required, it will fail if they aren't

entry_id.help: ========================================= SLIM naming conventions ========================================= note: [^_]* means match zero or more of any character BUT an underbar. (in other words make sure there is NOT a underbar before the string afterwards)
